description: This file is a shell script responsible for managing logs, including creating log directories, copying, backing up, and cleaning logs, as well as handling system reboot scenarios and disk space checks.

methods.name: backupAndRecoverLogs
methods.description: Copies or moves specific log files from a source to a destination based on provided extensions and operation

methods.name: backupLogsNotInList
methods.description: Moves logs not in the backup list to a trash directory, preserving them for one cycle
